channel.title: Posts on CBA MIS Python Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on CBA MIS Python Resources

item.title: MIS is transitioning to Python
item.description: Starting in summer 2020, an mis230 section (programming 1) will use Python as the instruction programming language. Transition plan will be as follows: MIS 230 section in Python offered Summer 2020 and will switch to all Python in Fall 2021 MIS 350 section in Python offered in Spring 2021 and will switch to all Python Spring 2022 All sections requiring programming projects will accomidate Visual Basic projects until Fall 2023
